title: NMTH - The Digital Age Of Dinosaurs (EP)
description:
NMTH - The Digital Age of Dinosaurs (EP) - 2008

Genres: Electronica/New Wave/Indie

please visit

--------------------------------------------------

Tracklisting:

1. Electroclash (3:11)

2. Blue Monday* (3:47)

3. We&#039;ll Dance Tonight (3:41)

4. Away From Me (6:23)

5. You Are My Sin (6:08)

6. Madworld Rx2** (5:12)

7. Frozen (6:03)


*Cover of "Blue Monday" by New Order.

**Cover of "Mad World" by Tears For Fears.

--------------------------------------------------

All songs are written*, recorded, 
 composed/arranged, and mixed by Nolan Thomas.

Album art by Nolan Thomas (including dino drawing).


*excluding covers:
	
"Blue Monday" written by Bernard Sumner/New Order.
    
"Mad World" written by Roland Orzabal.

--------------------------------------------------

This is NMTH&#039;s first and self released EP. It is legal and free to download.
